reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's appearance, with its pretty pattern and sparkle, and appreciate its quality, comfort, and fit that's true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Great fit. True to size, looks fantastic on Read more
items.author: Candace Webber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater!
items.body: I don't write reviews very often, but I loved this sweater straight away! The size and shape were perfect for me. I love the three-colors v design which were exactly as they look in the pictures! The sweater is super comfortable, soft and seems like great quality. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Softer than expected
items.body: Pros: it sparkles, it's soft against my skin, and it's warm but not suffocating. Plus, it machine washed and dried well. Cons: Despite the colors and sparkly thread, it somehow still looked dumpy, boring, and unstylish on me. Read more
items.author: Sharon Kramper

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good with my grey hair :(
items.body: Great looking sweater, I forgot that the cream color looks terrible with my grey hair. The leaves fit great but it was a little bulky/wide thru the middle. Read more
items.author: Kelly Roberts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: Last year I bought the gray and white version. Loved it. Soft and keeps its shape. I saw it again this season and since I loved it so much last year, I bought it in pink and white this time! Same thoughts again! Soft , comfy, good fit and shape and keeps it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No way!
items.body: Terrible it was cheaply made. It was so huge. It’s extremely ugly. I do not recommend. Read more
items.author: Bell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality sweater
items.body: Bought this in Size Large bc comments suggested it ran large. It does not. I usually wear XL. The size fits me but probably not as loosely as it should. XL would have been a better fit. But the sweater is really well made and very good thick quality. Read more
items.author: MCBern

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Need to Improve Stitching Colors and Cut of the Shoulder
items.body: I did not like the blue threads showing on the white, looks cheaply made instead of the quality it should have. Also, the shoulder with the gold trim was oddly done as it puckers. The front collar area had what looks like an to knit or a pull in the thread. Overall a beautiful sweater so I was disappointed for the flaws, they could do so much better and have 5 stars easily, too bad. Pic of what I was sold and pic of me in what I received. It's not super soft but not that scratchy either. I am 5' 5" and ordered a medium. I don't think it is meant to be skin tight and was just fine for my size, however, I will be returning mine. Read more
items.author: Malcain

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 44-v-grey, Four-blue, Four-grey, Tassel Black, Gradient Pink Orange, Four-black, Pure Pink, Black, Pure Cream, Pure Orange, Pearl Green, Pure Grey, 44-v-orange, Four-brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
